archdesc.bioghist: The SCIL Personnel Service Center served as a Liaison between the University Personnel office's functions and operating units Personnel served, and between the units served by the center and potential faculty and staff. It developed and administered policies and programs to attract, select, develop, and retain a diverse faculty and staff.
archdesc.scopecontent: Records include Monthly Reports from July 1984 to June 1988 which describe major accomplishments and problems in the areas of compensation, staff relations, employment and staff development. They briefly describe specific examples of problems relating to sexual harrassment, RIF, discipline of employees, and organizational restructuring.
